Welcome to The Flying Nerds, we start with a broad presentation of drones, their components or makeups

Information

Owning a drone is often depicted as too complicated or too expensive to get involved.
I started with Remote control Helicopter back in 2010. These helicopters were indeed complicated, expensive and difficult to enjoy them.

In 2015, I switched to drone with my first Dji, a new flying world was unravelling in front of my eyes. Soon my passion gave birth to The Flying Nerds.
Joined by others, we encourage, you and all, to explore the world of drones, whatever your level of knowledge.
Our main focus is educational drone. We provide you with tools and tips to feed your flying appetite.

Enjoy your visit on The Flying Nerds!
